title: Police release video from Vegas shooter’s suite
text:
Police release video from Vegas shooter’s suite 10:11am EDT - 01:26
Police released video taken by police officers responding to the October shooting at a Las Vegas outdoor concert that killed 58 people in the deadliest attack by a single gunman in U.S. history. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Police released video taken by police officers responding to the October shooting at a Las Vegas outdoor concert that killed 58 people in the deadliest attack by a single gunman in U.S. history.
